Title: Authorizes the Department of Veterans' Services to consult and collaborate with relevant offices in the department of health and other HCBS experts to develop educational materials for veterans and their families
Summary: Authorizes the Department of Veterans' Services to consult and collaborate with relevant offices in the department of health and other HCBS experts to develop educational materials for veterans and their families about the accessibility to home and community-based services.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the veterans' services law, in relation to availability of information on home care services
